last_episode_to_air.name: The Other Side of Rage
last_episode_to_air.overview: The pressure almost gets the better of her, but after a quick interaction with Ton, Retsuko picks up the microphone to speak to her potential voters.

name: Aggretsuko
overview: Frustrated with her thankless office job, Retsuko the Red Panda copes with her daily struggles by belting out death metal karaoke after work.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Frustrated with her thankless office job, Retsuko the Red Panda copes with her daily struggles by belting out death metal karaoke after work.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: From her mother meddling in her personal affairs to a nightmarish new coworker, Retsuko's still got a lot to rage about in her karaoke sessions.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Retsuko’s rage rises another octave when she finds herself moonlighting with an underground idol group to pay off her debts.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Retsuko turns up the volume to stop Haida from making the biggest mistake ever when a sly new company president takes the office to a new extreme.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: In this final season, Retsuko faces her biggest challenge yet when she's thrown head first into the world of politics. Get out the vote for Retsuko!

episodes.name: A Day in the Life of Retsuko
episodes.overview: As Retsuko enters her fifth year at a prestigious trading firm, she struggles to motivate herself everyday as the daily stress from work takes a toll.

episodes.name: A Good, Hard-working Girl
episodes.overview: Tired of her wholesome good-girl persona at work, Retsuko is drawn to the free-spirited lifestyle of her former high school classmate, Puko.

episodes.name: Short-timer
episodes.overview: Retsuko loses the will to tackle the daily grind after Puko asks her to join a new business venture. A fed up Retsuko talks back to her supervisor.

episodes.name: Walking Down the Aisle
episodes.overview: When plans to leave her thankless job fall through, Retsuko continues to work in hopes of some day marrying and becoming a full-time house wife.

episodes.name: Exposed
episodes.overview: The solitary life Retsuko leads is about to change when Director Gori and Washimi take her to a karaoke bar after yoga class.

episodes.name: Stoking Rebellion
episodes.overview: Washimi acknowledges Retsuko's efforts to make things right with Director Ton, using her position as assistant to the president as leverage to help.

episodes.name: The Duel
episodes.overview: After the president cautions Director Ton on his abrasive behavior, his unusually polite demeanor puzzles and frightens his direct reports.

episodes.name: The Out of Pocket Prince
episodes.overview: Persuaded by her colleagues Director Gori and Washimi, a reluctant Retsuko agrees to join a company singles mixer hosted by Tsunoda.

episodes.name: A Rosy World
episodes.overview: Supervisor Tsubone sends Retsuko on an errand to the sales department where she falls for a fellow colleague, Resasuke, whom she met the night before.

episodes.name: The Dream Ends
episodes.overview: A happy but frustrated Retsuko increasingly makes mistakes at work. Meanwhile, a busy quarterly reporting period looms ahead for the accounting team.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Frustrated with her thankless office job, Retsuko the Red Panda copes with her daily struggles by belting out death metal karaoke after work.

episodes.name: Time to Grow Up
episodes.overview: Retsuko becomes increasingly frustrated with her mother's overbearing ways. Director Ton demands the team be tough on their incoming new hire.

episodes.name: The New Hire Named Anai
episodes.overview: Without Retsuko's approval, her mother sets up an arranged marriage meeting. At first glance, new hire Anai seems like a nice and eager employee.

episodes.name: Double Moratorium
episodes.overview: Director Ton berates Retsuko for Anai's lack of progress on the job. Meanwhile, Anai continues to react very badly to any feedback from Retsuko.

episodes.name: Unavoidable Impact
episodes.overview: Retsuko and Anai have to host a food stall for the company’s Family Appreciation Day event, but Retsuko does all the work herself to avoid conflict.

episodes.name: United Front
episodes.overview: Everybody hates Retsuko’s badly-prepared yakisoba. Anai doesn’t lift a finger to help, until Kabae gives him some words of encouragement.

episodes.name: Unknown Future
episodes.overview: Hearing that Shirota has officially moved on, Retsuko lets herself be talked into attending a matchmaking event -- where she runs into Director Gori.

episodes.name: Growing Affection
episodes.overview: Now with a driver's license, Retsuko takes Gori and Washimi on a road trip, but things go south when the two ladies get into a heated argument.

episodes.name: He Lives Above the Clouds
episodes.overview: The unassuming Tadano turns out to be a rising tech mogul. He offers to take Retsuko out for ramen, but it's nothing like she imagined.

episodes.name: She's Dreaming
episodes.overview: Retsuko begins to dream of a happy future with Tadano. She joins him on a business-related golf outing, and is horrified when Director Ton shows up.

episodes.name: Wonderful Life
episodes.overview: The world learns all about Retsuko’s high profile relationship and Tadano declares that he wants to be with her forever -- without getting married.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: From her mother meddling in her personal affairs to a nightmarish new coworker, Retsuko's still got a lot to rage about in her karaoke sessions.

episodes.name: The Blessings of Life
episodes.overview: With her romance over, Retsuko fills the void with a virtual boyfriend. Her savings take a massive hit when she spends recklessly on in-game purchases.

episodes.name: Deep in the Hole
episodes.overview: Retsuko inadvertently backs into a parked car, damaging the other vehicle. Desperate for repair money, she reaches out to Gori for a loan.

episodes.name: A Sheltered Life
episodes.overview: To repay her debt, Retsuko starts working as the accounting manager for an underground idol group. In reality, she's at their beck and call.

episodes.name: Winds of Change
episodes.overview: The OTMGirls turn a profit for the first time thanks to Retsuko’s business acumen. Haida hits it off with Inui after an unexpected encounter.

episodes.name: An Urchin in the Desert
episodes.overview: After seeing Retsuko sing, Hyodo proposes that Retsuko become the lead vocalist, demoting Manaka in the process.

episodes.name: Crossroads
episodes.overview: The group’s popularity soars after a blogger's favorable review. Concerned by Retsuko's recent odd behavior, Haida secretly tails her to Hokkaido.

episodes.name: An Impenetrable Wall
episodes.overview: The OTMGirls receive an offer to perform at a rock festival. Hyodo rebrands the idols as a band, and the members must now learn to play instruments.

episodes.name: Bursting Her Bubble
episodes.overview: Manaka’s devotion to instrumental mastery inspires others to step up. Haida agrees to teach Retsuko guitar, but he invites Inui over on the same day.

episodes.name: The End of the Moratorium
episodes.overview: Inui opens up to Haida about her feelings, but he's unable to respond. Director Ton lectures Retsuko when he learns she has a side gig.

episodes.name: When You Count to Ten
episodes.overview: She's shaken, but Retsuko acts normal in front of her bandmates after a deranged fan accosts her. Haida struggles to choose between Retsuko and Inui.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Retsuko’s rage rises another octave when she finds herself moonlighting with an underground idol group to pay off her debts.

episodes.name: Someone from Work
episodes.overview: With a new apartment and a collection of weapons, Retsuko moves forward after her attack, but her relationship with Haida remains at a standstill.

episodes.name: The New Boss
episodes.overview: Haida helps the company president to the hospital after avoiding Retsuko. Changes come to the office when Himuro is chosen as the company new lead.

episodes.name: Dirty Work
episodes.overview: Retsuko and Haida's relationship worsens, and Fenneko panics. Himuro orders Ton to lay off several workers to save costs, but Ton refuses.

episodes.name: Unkept Promises
episodes.overview: Retsuko and Fenneko blab to Himuro about Ton's past work harassment during a night of drinking. Retsuko tells Haida she only wants to be friends.

episodes.name: Options
episodes.overview: Ton despairs about his demotion while Yagyu becomes the new director. Haida gains a confidence boost after Retsuko reaches out to him.

episodes.name: Struggle for Survival
episodes.overview: Ton resigns without telling his family. Yagyu nags Kabae after she leaves early to care for her son. Retsuko and her friends worry about more changes.

episodes.name: Moving Up
episodes.overview: Himuro praises Haida's work; Retsuko learns about Ton's new job. Feeling guilty, she tries to talk to Haida, but he's too busy doing Himuro's bidding.

episodes.name: Headhunting
episodes.overview: Encouraged by Tadano, Retsuko tries to get Ton to manage her Death-Voice channel. Haida accepts a nefarious task from Himuro.

episodes.name: Unauthorized Access
episodes.overview: Retsuko uncovers Haida's actions after he gets his own office and seeks advice from Ton. Finally, Retsuko decides to confront Haida.

episodes.name: Rendezvous
episodes.overview: Retsuko's friends join up to gather evidence of fraud. After Haida admits his involvement and Retsuko berates him, he makes one last critical decision.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Retsuko turns up the volume to stop Haida from making the biggest mistake ever when a sly new company president takes the office to a new extreme.

episodes.name: A Prison Called Freedom
episodes.overview: Haida still doesn't have a job, and doesn't seem interested in getting another one any time soon – which makes Retsuko feel uneasy.

episodes.name: Spooky Shikabane
episodes.overview: With no job, no home and no girlfriend, Haida hunkers down in an internet cafe and, mortifyingly, bumps into an online friend in real life.

episodes.name: ANAGURA and Reality
episodes.overview: Under the avatar "Fennelope," Fenneko befriends Haida and Shikabane in the online game and sets up a meeting with them in real life.

episodes.name: Restart
episodes.overview: Haida now has to visit Retsuko's parents in two weeks. He'll have to tell them that he's unemployed — unless he can find a job before then.

episodes.name: A Mysterious Messenger
episodes.overview: A suspicious looking man comes up to Manaka after an OTM Girls' show and asks her about "Aggressive Retsuko." Haida meets up with Tadano.

episodes.name: A Family Emergency
episodes.overview: Haida tells her she doesn't have to come, but Retsuko insists on going with him to visit his family home — and it's nothing like what she expected.

episodes.name: Rage Mission
episodes.overview: Retsuko gets approached by a suspicious, but somewhat familiar-looking man who really, really wants her to run for office.

episodes.name: Rising to the Challenge
episodes.overview: The day after taking to the stage with Ikari, Retsuko is filled with stress and regret. Time for an epic karaoke session!

episodes.name: A Disconnected World
episodes.overview: Running for office isn't for the faint hearted — or the empty pocketed. They need to come up with a 3 million yen deposit fast.

episodes.name: The Other Side of Rage
episodes.overview: The pressure almost gets the better of her, but after a quick interaction with Ton, Retsuko picks up the microphone to speak to her potential voters.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: In this final season, Retsuko faces her biggest challenge yet when she's thrown head first into the world of politics. Get out the vote for Retsuko!
